New Records: Pakistan included three debutants: Muhammad Irfan Khan, Usman Khan, and Abrar Ahmed; New Zealand also included several debutants, including Tim Robinson
Key Match Events: Shaheen Shah Afridi bowled a stunning delivery to dismiss Tim Robinson, which was the first delivery of the match before rain halted play
Pre-Game Insights: The match was the first of the T20I series between Pakistan and New Zealand; both teams had made several changes to their squads, including appointing Babar Azam as the captain after Shaheen Afridi's removal
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was called off due to rain, but it was reduced to a 5-over game; both teams were preparing for the T20 World Cup 2024
Others: The article mentions the teams' preparations and the importance of the match ahead of the T20 World Cup
